Queens Logic

Ano: 1991

IMDb ID: tt0102741

Classificação: 5.8

Sinopse: In Queens, a group of friends prepares a bachelor party for their childhood friends painter artist Ray (Ken Olin) and Patricia (Chloe Webb); however, Ray has cold feet and is insecure whether there will be wedding. During the party, there are discoveries for most of them. Al (Joe Mantegna), who is married to Carla (Linda Fiorentino) with two daughters, is a womanizer and meets the wealthy Grace (Jamie Lee Curtis) who teaches him a lesson. The musician Dennis (Kevin Bacon), who seems to be proud of living in Hollywood, confesses that he misses Queens. The gay Eliot (John Malkovich) gets rid of Jeremy (Terry Kenney) and stays with his friend Marty (Michael Zelniker). Ray meets the gorgeous Asha (Jenny Wright) and finds what he wants.—Claudio Carvalho, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
